nodes.text: Command bunker 1 was a heavily fortified defense bunker that the Confederacy of Independent Systems and Geonosians used during the Clone Wars to hold back the Grand Army of the Republic's assault on Geonosis while the Separatist Council could evacuate. The bunker had ammo and medical droids inside it to assist in the battle. During the battle, the Jedi Master Mace Windu, with the assistance of the 501st Legion, captured the bunker.

Although Command Bunker 1 remains similar in both Star Wars: Battlefront II and Star Wars Battlefront: Renegade Squadron, the area around it was very different. In Battlefront II, there was a hangar behind the bunker, but in Renegade Squadron, the hangar was replaced by Command Bunker 2. Also, there was a great chasm to the right of the bunker that disappeared in Renegade Squadron.
